snippet.title: The Weird Dream - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
The Weird Dream is a 2D action-adventure Metroidvania game developed by Shanghai AmberDragon. Players will embody a chainsaw-wielding bunny in a handcrafted fantasy world that sets out to confront Alpha City’s mutated inhabitants. Level up skills, explore the environments, and combat big bosses to unravel the truth behind the City’s untimely destruction. The Weird Dream is launching on March 7 for PC.

#Gaming #GameTrailers #Games
